user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user

is_contractor.description: Flag indicating if the user is a contractor

total_hours.description: The total number of hours worked for the time period

billable_hours.description: The number of hours that can be billed for the time period

billable_amount.description: The amount that can be billed for the time period

from.description: The start date and time of the time period

to.description: The end date and time of the time period
